rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hallway that transitions from the main gate to interior spaces.
Spacious living area with natural lighting and energy-efficient windows.
Eco-friendly kitchen equipped with energy-saving appliances and sustainable materials.
Well-ventilated bathroom with water-efficient fixtures and natural ventilation design.
Dedicated workspace optimized for productivity and sound insulation; includes ergonomic furniture and ample daylight.
Open-plan living area combining bedroom, dining, and lounge areas with sustainable interior finishes.

features: optimized for natural light per Vastu
